name: Shekel Mobility
headline: B2B marketplace for Auto Dealers in Africa
description:
Our platform helps car dealers find, finance and sell more cars in the $30B African used Car market.

We are building the largest auto dealership ecosystem ; powering $10Bn transactions annually

founders.name: Benjamen Oladokun, Founder
founders.description:
Benjamen is Founder of Shekel Mobility.                                                                                                                        
Ben founded his first successful business at 17 and has since led teams to launch products that have impacted the mobility sector in SSA and generated several million of dollars. An experienced growth hacker and an experienced entrepreneur.

founders.name: Valentine Mayaki, Founder
founders.description: A rockstar engineer who has over 10 years of experience and has built scalable application for various sectors especially fintech. He has worked for companies like Nextravel, Andela etc.

founders.name: Sanmi Olukanmi, Founder
founders.description:
Sanmi is an experienced mobility entrepreneur and the
co-founder and Chief Executive Officer at Shekel.
Over the last 10 years, Sanmi has founded and exited
enterprises with an average USD 900K ARR in the
automotive industry overseeing sourcing, business
Strategy and growth.
Sanmi studied Engineering Physics at Obafemi Awolowo
University.

# Empowering Auto Dealers to Find, Finance, and Sell Cars

Your Auto Dealership just got smarter
Take your business to the next level with our all-in-one platform. Access credit, trade cars, and manage your business right from your mobile phone

generated_description:
**Shekel Mobility: Driving Innovation in the African Auto Market**

Founded in 2022 and part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W23, Shekel Mobility is paving the way for a transformative B2B marketplace for auto dealers across Africa. Located in Lagos, Nigeria, this nimble startup, with a dedicated team of 18, is banking on the immense $30 billion African used car market, aiming to power around $10 billion in transactions annually.

**The Vision**

At its core, Shekel Mobility's mission is to empower car dealers to discover, finance, and sell vehicles more efficiently. Think of it as an all-in-one solution that leverages technology to streamline the way auto dealerships operate. The goal is clear: to create the largest auto dealership ecosystem in Africa.

**What Shekel Mobility Offers**

The platform is proud of its comprehensive suite of tools designed just for auto dealers:

1. **Shekel Credit**: This service provides inventory financing to help dealers focus on selling cars without the burden of upfront costs.
2. **Shekel Business**: A centralized hub for managing dealership operations, from sourcing cars to conducting sales—all managed seamlessly through a mobile app.
3. **Shekel Pay**: Facilitates secure transactions, bill payments, and money tracking, ensuring that dealers can handle all financial aspects of their business in one place.

**Why It Matters**

The significance of Shekel Mobility goes beyond just making transactions easier—it addresses a critical gap in the African auto industry. By supporting dealers with advanced financial tools and operational efficiencies, Shekel Mobility helps them scale their businesses more effectively and manage inventory better.

The accolades so far indicate success; customers report increased transaction volumes, operational improvements, and robust support from the Shekel Mobility team.

**Leadership and Support**

With Michael Seibel as their group partner at Y Combinator, the startup benefits from invaluable guidance and mentoring. 

**Conclusion**

Shekel Mobility is not just another fintech solution; it's a transformative platform aiming to reshape the automotive landscape in Africa. With its innovative approach and robust product offerings, it’s well-positioned to drive growth in the automotive sector and create a ripple effect that benefits both dealers and consumers alike in this booming market.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Shekel Mobility](https://www.shekelmobility.com/).
